exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet * is not finished.

original: intros n. induction n. - left. exists 1. split; eauto. - destruct IHn as [H1 | H2]. + left. destruct H1 as [p [H3 [H4 H5]]]. exists p. split. * split; eauto. * split; eauto. + right. intros p H3 H4 H5. apply H2. destruct (Nat.eq_dec p 1) as [HP1 | HP2]. * subst. contradiction H3. eauto. * destruct (Nat.eq_dec p (S n)) as [H6 | H7]. -- subst. contradiction H4. eauto. -- contradict H5. exists p. eauto.
